FuncDef: The display statistics fabric-queue multicast command displays statistics about upstream multicast VoQs on a board, including the number of multicast VoQ packets and bytes that this board forwards or drops.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the board where the VoQs are buffered.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 31.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To display statistics about upstream multicast VoQs on a board, including the number of multicast VoQ packets and bytes that this board forwards or drops, run the display statistics fabric-queue multicast command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
